Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to requiring the department of education to stock opioid antagonists in all school buildings
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of education to stock opioid antagonists in all school buildings.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to a pilot program to review school start times to reduce adolescent sleep deprivation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: A pilot program to review school start times to reduce adolescent sleep deprivation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting on food and nutrition education in New York city schools
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting on food and nutrition education in NYC schools.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to ban processed meats from being served in New York City public schools.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to ban processed meats from being served in NYC public schools.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to create a diabetes and prediabetes health based curriculum.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to create a diabetes and prediabetes health based curriculum.

Items.Title: Oversight - Health & Wellness Instruction in NYC Schools.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Health & Wellness Instruction in NYC Schools.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to report information regarding sexual health education
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring DOE to report information regarding sexual health education.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to adopt all of the policy recommendations of the Mayor’s Sexual Health Education Task Force and provide comprehensive sexual health education on a regular basis, across all grade levels.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to adopt all of the policy recommendations of the Mayor’s Sexual Health Education Task Force and provide comprehensive sexual health education on a regular basis, across all grade levels.
